page.title: 03Two Farms (1)Gleadthorpe
page.content: In the area is the Ministry of Agriculture's "Gleadthorpe Experimental Farm." Here the staff advise local farmers on the care of the land and on the best crops to grow thus providing a valuable service to local farmers. On the 500 acre farm ,chickens , turkeys ,and 150 cattle are kept ,and much work is also done on crops.At the present time they are trying out tulip bulbs, onion bulbs, carrots, and rape seed.These are grown as an alternative to cereals to see if they are likely to be worthwhile to the farmers for {E.E.C.}purposes.
